name: Part of the World
description:
A short visual novel about time traveling robots and "progress".

You are Ellis. That was the name your step mother, Lisa, gave to you. You are an artificial adopted by Lisa because her previous android son was accidentally broken. Lisa has been encouraging you to travel the world and to live your life to the fullest using her wealth, but you find running a coffee shop since the day you woke up is much more interesting. And one day, she gave you a time machine.

This game features 2 possible endings.

Inspired by Detroit: Become Human and Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou.

Music by https://hac-creative.itch.io
